languageKey.label: Lightbox
Files
Main properties
If you need help, please refer to the extension manager. There is an evaluator too. And you can enable the DRS - the Development Reporting System. The DRS reports the work flow.

Warning: The DRS - Development Reporting System - is enabled. This costs performance and is a security risk for any operative sytem. You can disable the DRS in the extension manager. Status: %status%.
Bug: This plugin isn't saved never.
Congratulations: Your configuration is ok!
Direct link to the Constant Editor. There are further properties for Flip it!.

Fix it: Save the Flexform once.
If you have any question about Flip it!, please refer to the online manual Flip it!.

Einstellungen
Im Extension Manager kannst Du weitere Einstellungen prüfen und DRS - Development Reporting System - aktivieren. Das DRS zeigt Dir den gesamten Arbeitsprozess an.

Warnung: Das DRS - Development Reporting System - ist aktiviert. Das kostet Performance und ist ein Sicherheistririsko für jedes operative System.Du kannst das DRS im Extension Manager deaktivieren. Status: %status%.
